scripts.test:codec: cd py_engine && uv run python codec.py
scripts.test:auditor: cd py_engine && uv run python -c "from auditor import evaluate_bias_audit; print(evaluate_bias_audit('Nurses are gentle', 'gender', 'generative'))"
scripts.test:inference: cd py_engine && uv run python -c "from inference import generate_counterfactuals_nlp; print(generate_counterfactuals_nlp('The nurse was gentle', 'gender'))"
